subject: Order Mistake: Kindly Asking for Your Support
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Support team,

I have just placed an order with the number #SN2724. Unfortunately, right
after completing the payment, I realized that I had mistakenly forgotten to
include the mounting bracket for the Haptic Reactor. I actually attempted
to add it to my cart, but for some reason it was not included.

As a result, I immediately placed another order for the mounting bracket
under the number #SN2725. I fully acknowledge that this was my mistake.
However, I kindly ask if it would be possible to refund the shipping cost
that was applied to the second order. If this is not possible, I completely
understand.

Above all, I would greatly appreciate it if the mounting bracket could be
shipped together with my Haptic Reactor in the same box.
Thank you very much for your time and understanding.

Best regards,
Kwanghee Lee

conversations.body_text: Okay, we shall dispatch your purchased items together in a larger box designed for the P3-H3 pedal.
